body.name: A5 Lined Journal Notebook - 365 Page Leather Journals for Writing Women & Men，Hardcover Notebook with 100Gsm Thick Pages，Daily Diary for Travel, Work，School，Note Taking，College Ruled (5.9" x 8.5")

Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 18 hrs 31 mins
features: 【365 Pages Premium Thick Paper】: Our PERCUN lined journal notebook is made of 365 pages high-quality 100Gsm thick ruled pager with an acid-free light Ivory paper that is thicker than normal. This premium quality paper will not cause bleeding, ghosting or smudging and is suitable for most types of pens，provides ample space for journaling, note-taking, and creative writing. The line spacing is 8mm, making it easy to write legibly and neatly.

【Hardcover Leather Journal Notebook】The A4 notebook (size: 5.9in x 8.5in) comes with a stunning "Tree of Life" print design that adds a touch of elegance to your writing experience. The cover leather provides durability and protection to your journal for everyday use in the office, work, home, college, students, adults, scientists, and people in many other fields. It is perfect for writing, drawing, and note-taking.

【180°Lay Flat for Writing】Our notebook also comes with 180°Lay Flat Journal Notebook, which makes writing a breeze. The elastic pen holder and bookmark ensure that you never lose track of your pen, and the 2 elastic closures ensure that your journal stays securely closed. The 3 colored ribbon bookmarks and 3 sticky labels provide even more ways to customize your journal to your liking.Built-in back pocket that is great for storing loose notes, cards, or other important items.

【Versatile Use】This journal notebook is perfect for men or women and is suitable for use in the office, work, home, college, and students. Whether you want to use it as a journal for women, reading journal, travel journal for women, notebook for note taking, or a diary for women, this notebook is perfect for any need.

【Perfect Notebook & Gift】In short, the PERCUN Lined Journal Notebook is a high-quality, large journals for writing that is perfect for personal or professional use. It's a great gift for moms, dads, teachers, classmates, co-workers, wives, husbands, friends, daughters, sons and granddaughters. Buy yours today and start enjoying the benefits of this leather notebook!
body.description: College Ruled Notebook Tree of Life Record your valuable thoughts, memories and experiences in this classic leather journal notebook. Its beautiful "Tree of Life" pattern design adds a sophisticated touch to your writing routine. With college ruled pages, this notebook is perfect for writing notes, essays or simply chronicling your daily life. The leather cover will keep your pages safe and in good condition for years to come.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PERCUN 365 Pages Thick Lined Journal Notebook - Records Everyday Bit of Your Life 1. PERCUN A4 notebook (5.9in x 8.5in /150mm x 215mm) with 365 pages and 100GSM thick lined pager for the best writing experience. 2. Features a durable leather cover with "Tree of Life" print design and elastic pen holder for added convenience. 3. 180° Lay flat design and 8 mm line spacing make writing easy and comfortable, ideal for both men and women. 4. Includes 3 colored ribbon bookmarks, 2 elastic closures, 1 inner pocket, and 3 stickers for added organization. 5. Whether you need a business notebook or travel journal, this notebook is perfect for anyone who wants a top quality notebook that looks good anywhere.

Notebooks Are Available In A Variety Of Colors And A5/B5/A4 Aizes PERCUN's lined journal notebook is the perfect tool for jotting down your thoughts and ideas. Available in a variety of colors and sizes (A5/B5/A4), this big, thick notebook features high-quality lined paper for easy writing. Our leather-bound journals are perfect for men and women, with personalized options available. Whether you're a student, business professional, or avid writer, these notebooks are perfect for daily use. Start journaling and take notes in style with PERCUN's lined journal notebook.

Looking For A High-quality Journal Notebook For All Your Writing Needs? Look No Further Than The PERCUN A5 Notebook! With 365 pages of 100GSM thick ruled paper and 8mm page line spacing, this lined journal notebook provides plenty of space for all your writing needs. Made from acid-free Ivory paper that is thicker than normal, it won't cause bleeding, ghosting or smudging and is suitable for most types of pens. The 180° Lay Flat design makes it easy to write on any surface. This A5 medium notebook also comes with 3 free index tabs stickers that can work as highlighters, dividers, and tabs. Plus, with 3 colored ribbon bookmarks, finding important content is faster and easier than ever before. Ideal for men and women who love to write, the PERCUN A5 notebook is the perfect companion to help you stay organized and productive.

Invest in this notebook for all your writing needs! This A5 notebook is a versatile companion for work, travel, and everyday use. With a sturdy hardcover and sleek leather finish, it's perfect for students, adults, scientists, and professionals in any field. Use it at home, in the office, or on the go. It also makes a great gift for loved ones, including moms, dads, teachers, coworkers, and friends. Get organized and stay productive with this sophisticated notebook from PERCUN.

Hardcover Leather Cover Notebook This large, hardcover notebook features a gorgeous "Tree of Life" Pattern Design on its leather cover. Perfect for journaling or taking notes on the go, this durable notebook is sure to become a cherished keepsake. College Ruled Notebook Tree of Life Record your valuable thoughts, memories and experiences in this classic leather journal notebook. Its beautiful "Tree of Life" pattern design adds a sophisticated touch to your writing routine. With college ruled pages, this notebook is perfect for writing notes, essays or simply chronicling your daily life. The leather cover will keep your pages safe and in good condition for years to come.

A5/B5/A4 Thick Notebook This A5/B5/A4 Thick Notebook is made of high-quality leather and is perfect for capturing your everyday thoughts and ideas. Its sturdy cover and thick pages ensure that your notes stay safe and secure. A perfect gift for those who like to jot down their ideas on the go. 2 Elastic Closure This large leather journal is perfect for keeping notes, writing down your thoughts and ideas, or even sketching. It comes with 2 elastic closures to keep your pages secure. Stylish and practical! 3 Colored Ribbon Bookmarks This big notebook features 3 colored ribbon bookmarks to help you stay organized and find your place quickly. Perfect for journaling, note-taking, and more! Built-in Pocket & 3 Sticky Tabs This journal comes with an expandable inner pocket for stashing loose notes, business cards, receipts, or other small items. Additionally, it has 3 Sticky Tabs that can work as highlighters, dividers and tabs. Perfect for keeping your life organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great journal!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't hold out much hope for a product made in China as I have been sorely disappointed time & again over misleading descriptions, quality of product, actual page count (I don't even want to go there), etc. I am a journaling freak, been keeping a journal for almost 58 years. Always have a pen & notebook close by. Always on the hunt for the "perfect" notebook, & they are few & far between these days (usually it's page count & paper quality that's the biggest hang up for me: thin, cheesy notebook paper, forget it; glued binding, forget that, too). Can't find anything with 110 gsm paper: a dream to write on with fountain pens. Anyway, nowadays everything is made overseas & it has adversely affected (big time) the quality of everything I look for in a journal. Old standbys I used 40 years ago are no longer made in the US, not the same quality, & prices are ridiculously high. That is, until I stumbled upon Percun, I thought, "Oh well, they aren't that expensive, might as well cross my fingers & try a couple of them out." I ordered 2 green ones in the A4 size. It was a big crapshoot; buy the ticket, take the ride. When the two notebooks came in, I was stunned! And in a very good way. Somehow Amazon managed to ship them without destroying them in the process. I guess I got lucky. They usually throw product into an oversized box, no packing material whatsoever to protect it from the throes of poor terrain, turbulent air, rogue wave high seas shipping (& sometimes a combination of 1 or more of the above if the package changes shippers enroute), which means you get a product with crushed &/or bent corners, broken spines or separated (read torn) covers from the book content & other sad horrors of ill-treatment--unfortunately, it happens way too many times). Amazingly, the notebooks were in a box almost the right size for them, & although they were loose inside with just a thin cellophane wrapping, they were not damaged at all! Shock & awe! Anyway, I like a BIG notebook, with plenty of space to "think with my hands." A4 is a little bigger than US standard 8.5 X 11, & it's heavy! But I have found I like it like that, means it's substantial, a force to be reckoned with, to be tamed, take my thoughts & dreams, my life, & keep them safe! The pages are sewn in (only time will tell if it was well done) and it opens flat. Yes, it is made in China (strike one); they falsely ascribe a 'college ruling' (strike two), but I was taking a chance because if the pictures actually showed an A4 (which I didn't believe was true either) I counted the number of lines to a page: 24. If it was actual college ruling, there should be at least 35 lines. Therefore, the main header description was flat wrong. Turns out, the spacing in this notebook is actually 8 mm & is perfect! College ruling is 7mm or less (get your introductory descriptions correct, vendors, this info is important!). 8mm is plenty of space to be able to read what you write and enjoy the process. It was also claimed it was 365 pages (this is a pet peeve of mine, a lot of foreign countries will claim a certain page count, but you get the product & they gyp you out of several sheets, which makes me want to wring someone's neck). I counted the sheets twice in both notebooks; lo & behold there were 365 pages for real! Beware though, the pages are NOT numbered (can't have everything, I guess). Paper is 100 gsm which seems to be considered the new standard for "heavy paper." But it is way better than notebook paper which wasn't designed to last 1,000 years let alone 100. Nice cream color, wide lines, smooth paper, but not ideal for heavier nibbed fountain pens (i.e. medium point or larger), gel pens are too greasy, & a 0.7mm steel nib ballpoint will score the paper & make it curl (been there, done that, annoying). The top of every page has boxes for weather & the days of the week, lines for Memo No. & a date. End papers are much heavier than the lined sheets, a must. The first page after the front endpaper is reserved for Personal Data (your name & contact info) which is in the lower 1/3rd of the page. The upper right quarter has a nice drawing of an open blank book & a quill pen, a rather nice touch. The cover: & this can also be a deal breaker: if the description states 'hard cover', it better be just that -- HARD, NO FLEX at all, period. This is notebook gets a very good grade for a hard bound: you can sit with it in your lap and not have it flopping all over the place. The cover feels like suede, a very nice feel. A nice embossed stylized tree with the sun peeking out is nicely done. But the thing is, it is NOT REAL leather. If it was, you'd be paying at least triple for it & it would smell like leather. If you see words like "polyurethane", or "PU" (polyurethane abbreviated), in any description on any product, it is not real leather. I would suggest you educate yourself & look this up on the internet, you'll be shocked about what you read. But it is used a lot on a great many different products. And it doesn't last as long as you'd like it to. In some states or countries, the stuff is banned for reasons you can read about for yourself! Now I don't know exactly what this is on the cover, but it's not leather. Although it does have a nice feel & it looks well made. Extra little amenities: you get three narrow, satin ribbon markers (the green came with green, brown, black); a small packet of sticky markers; a large pocket in the back (for extra notes or calendar sheets or secret phone numbers); two narrow elastic bands that wrap vertically around the book to keep it closed when not in use; & an elastic loop sewn into the edge of the back cover for your writing instrument. OVERALL: I am happily surprised with this notebook. I like it a lot, & I'm extremely picky when it comes to my writing materials. In fact, I like these two so much, I just ordered two more, in brown. I hope Percun sticks around for a long while because I'd like to order more of these, 2 at a time in several other colors. Thank you Percun for a really nice product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful journal with plenty of lined pages for whatever you wish to fill it with. It’s very large, with pages almost the size of standard notebook paper (but much nicer), and the cover is pleasing to the touch. I would definitely buy again for myself or even as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for super busy!
reviews.reviewText: Busy adult daughter loved it. I worried it was too big (it’s super thick) but she liked the idea that her important notes for the various areas of her life from personal journaling to job/grad school/upcoming move lists would all be in one place. Two ribbons to help categorize the book is nice. Great quality and features for price. Beautiful cover design that coordinated well with her study Bible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the great quality of this notebook. Just love the size and the space to write. The soft texture of its cover even though it’s a hardcover notebook. Will purchase again in other colors. The band to keep it closed and the included ribbon to bookmark where you at in the writing its a great added feature. The little sticky notes and labels to use as a marker of a new month if you are journaling is great. Super happy with purchase. Bought 2 more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So l can purchased this book to use as a journal. The outside is soft, the tree design is very well formed. Its a firm soft cover. Firmer then a plastic cover on a spiral notebook. When page turning there isnt resistance in the sense that you would have to rip the page from the spine binding just for it to lay flat for writing. There is flexibility so you are not ruining the pages . The spine is in good condition. The spine fabric is a little loose to allow flexibility but not hugely gapey. The folder in the back was a delightful surprise! Ribbons are accommodating. The stretchy wrap for keeping the book closed. It comes with two, which l find adds character as well as a fail safe in case one breaks. Mine didnt come with a pen but l can appreciate the accommodation! Pages are of good quality. I press hard when l write. Ive always been like that. In a standard notebook my writing imprints usually 5 pages in, vs this book it was the back side of the page an a little on the second page but nothing further. It is fluid resistant to a extent but does leave marks so l would find this products book exterior qualified for scotch guard. Id definitely would buy again! I love there is a variety of colors to choose from! I grade this 99.9% A+!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave this journal to my son as a Christmas gift. He uses it for daily writing, spiritual writing and his poetry. It’s very soft and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for gifting
reviews.reviewText: Journal looks even nicer in person. I would prefer at least 200 sheets myself, but 182 is close enough. Would also prefer thicker paper, but this 100 gsm paper is much better than super thin 80 or 90 gsm. Layout is very good, pages lay flat and extra ribbon markers are very useful. A4 size is perfect for comfortable writing. Thoughtful gift for someone into journaling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy, nice looking journal . I wanted the 365 pages for each day and there is a blank page at the back I can use since this is a leap year. Great value verses what I found in the stores.
I expected to be good but it exceeded my expectations! It is very well crafted, the pages are well bound and the cover is really good quality. I am very happy with my purchase! Thank you very much!
